name: [Spread]
description:
The player incarnates a little builder-robot sent on the Moon with a team of spacemen. The main goal is to develop the landing zone to create a ressources independent base. This first step reached you will have to help spreading the human race in the whole solar system !

How to play (for noobs)

arrows for movements  < ^ >

right click to place a mining machine on an ore vein (above the robot head)

left click to remove a mining machine (above the robot head)

X to open inventory / while the inventory is open : X for next page and C to close the inventory.
